name: The Dungeon of Luck
description:
Weekly Game jam 141 "Good Luck"

The Dungeon of Luck is a game that i made for the weekly game jam, I am 13 and This is my first proper game jam! The game is about a small green cube guy who loves exploring dungeons. He then finds a magic four leaf clover and picks it up. This clover grants him with the power of luck being on his side. If its either teleporting out of danger or falling into water instead of lava, It's the clover that does it.

How to Play: Walk using the arrow keys or with a supported game controller. Press Z (or X if on game controller) to get lucky (this isn't always the same luck). Get to the End!

Short but sweet

Check out my other games: Here!

-Supereo (Ben)
